topology:
该网络拓扑采用IPv6双路由协议冗余设计，包含4台路由器设备。DeviceT作为核心汇聚节点，通过Interface1连接DeviceA (2001:db8:200::0/64网段)，通过Interface3连接DeviceB (2001:db8:100::0/64网段)，通过Interface2连接DeviceC (2001:db8:10::0/64网段)。

链路A为主路径：DeviceT → DeviceA → DeviceC，采用OSPFv3路由协议，覆盖区域0.0.0.0。DeviceA通过Interface2与DeviceC的Interface2相连 (2001:db8:201::0/64网段)。

链路B为备份路径：DeviceT → DeviceB → DeviceC，采用IS-IS IPv6路由协议，网络实体标识分别为10.0000.0000.0001 (DeviceT)、10.0000.0000.0002 (DeviceB)、10.0000.0000.0003 (DeviceC)。DeviceB通过Interface2与DeviceC的Interface3相连 (2001:db8:101::0/64网段)。

DeviceT启用IPv6 FRR快速重路由功能，配置OSPFv3 (Router-ID: 1.1.1.1) 和IS-IS双协议支持。当链路A发生故障时，流量自动切换至链路B，实现毫秒级故障收敛，确保网络高可用性。所有设备均配置IPv6使能，支持双栈路由协议间的无缝切换。
requirement: 通过配置公网IPv6 FRR，主链路故障时，流量可以快速切换到备份链路。要求在DeviceT上配置备份出接口和备份下一跳，使链路B为链路A的备份。当链路A出现故障时，流量可以快速切换到链路B上，提高网络的可靠性。
steps: 在DeviceT、DeviceB和DeviceC上使能IPv6 IS-IS基本功能。
在DeviceT上使能公网IPv6 FRR功能，查看备份出接口和备份下一跳的信息。
IPv6 FRR去使能后，查看备份出接口和备份下一跳的信息。

configs.DeviceT:
#
sysname DeviceT
#
ipv6 frr
#
isis is-level level-1 ipv6 enable topology ipv6 network-entity 10.0000.0000.0001.
#
ospfv3 router-id 1.1.1.1 area 0.0.0.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:10::1/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.0
 isis ipv6 enable
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:200::1/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet3/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:100::1/64
 isis enable
 isis ipv6 enable
return
configs.DeviceA:
#
sysname DeviceA
#
ospfv3 router-id 2.2.2.2 area 0.0.0.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:200::2/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:201::2/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.0
return
configs.DeviceB:
#
sysname DeviceB
#
isis is-level level-1 ipv6 enable topology ipv6 network-entity 10.0000.0000.0002.
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:100::2/64
 isis ipv6 enable 1
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:101::2/64
 isis ipv6 enable 1
return
configs.DeviceC:
#
sysname DeviceC
#
isis is-level level-1 ipv6 enable topology ipv6 network-entity 10.0000.0000.0003.
#
ospfv3 router-id 1.1.1.1 area 0.0.0.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:20::1/64
 isis enable
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:201::1/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet3/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:101::1/64
 isis enable
 isis ipv6 enable 1
return
